author: .paulharris
content: the advise i was given was its a rehersal for mainnet launch, so do whatever we are planning on doing for mainnet...

author: .paulharris
content: is that not everyones plan? should i adjust our teams expectations of bootnodes?

author: nishant0
content: Ah no, we will also probably set it up. Just from past experience with the previous dev nets, the specific bootnode for a devnet eventually ends up being taken over by nodes from any 'larger' running network

author: .paulharris
content: it sounded like we'd shut down the netowrk / bootnodes a few days in, but i have second hand info

author: nishant0
content: If it needs to 'simulate' a real launch as much as possible then its fine to also add a few new ones

author: nishant0
content:
> it sounded like we'd shut down the netowrk / bootnodes a few days in, but i have second hand info
